SANTA'S SWEATSHOP

by Sumiguchi

Released Jan 2, 2006
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

A Christmas themed action/puzzle game for your GBA. Santa's workshop is at full production and you need to sort and pack the gifts that the elves throw to you. 5 challenge modes have been created that vary the gameplay parameters.

Screenshots
